inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: positive result obtained by performing a screening test for anti-HIV-1 and anti-HIV-2 and at least one confirmatory test

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: at least three months prior to the start of the study

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Total Cholesterol > 170mg / dL associated with: Triglycerides greater than or equal to LDL cholesterol ≥ 130 mg / dL

inclusion.criterion: Availability to participate in the nutritional intervention
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are unaware of their HIV diagnosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, but no other exclusion criteria mentioned. He is on antiretroviral therapy and has dyslipidemia.
